typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceMongoExportedFile
SourceMongoExportedFile derive(parKey = fruit+toString('-')+toString(toDate(datetime)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedColumn4NewPartitionKey
DerivedColumn4NewPartitionKey sink(partitionFileNames:['NoHeadNewFileAddedPartitionKeyColumn.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> NewFileAddedPartitionKeyColumn
